data.actual_result: The audio is stuttering until the other users leaves that screen
data.expected_result: The audio is not supposed to lag and stutter
data.short_description: When a user is screensharing with audio and goes to "Voice and Video" in his user settings, the audio lags
data.steps_to_repro: - call your best friend and make them screenshare their favourite video, game or other media with audio! - tell them to go to their user settings and to select "voice & video" - listen
